gameDetails.name: Dominion: Church Promo Card
gameDetails.description:
This card was designed to commemorate the victors of the "Jubiläumsmeisterschaft" (Anniversary Championship), organized in 2018 in Germany and Austria to celebrate ten years of Dominion.

Text:



    
        Church (Action-Duration - Cost 3 [coin])

    
    
        +1 Action
Set aside up to 3 cards from your hand face down. At the start of your next turn, put them into your hand, then you may trash a card from your hand.

    


Part of the Dominion series.
